title: Éloi, en quête d'un disparu
overview: Immerse yourself in the disturbing and breathtaking world of an unsolved case. A French criminal case which gave the director the opportunity to carry out his own investigation, a thrilling investigation, certain elements of which were taken up by the French police. There remains nonetheless a "disturbing disappearance" that is unresolved but which is listed and likely to be reopened if a new clue appears.
